GMCM.ToggleHotkey.Desc: This is the toggle hotkey for Auto-Hoe.
GMCM.AutoSwitch.Desc: Automatically switch to the hoe when near applicable locations.
GMCM.MarkDirt.Desc: Enable marking dirt with right-click. Marked dirt will be included in auto-digging targets.
GMCM.KeepMark.Desc: Marks will remain even when switching to other tools.
GMCM.ArtifactSpot.Desc: Include artifact spots as dig targets.
GMCM.MineDirt.Desc: Includes mine dirt in the digging targets.
GMCM.RetainStamina.Desc: When the remaining Stamina reaches this percentage, Auto-Hoe will stop.
GMCM.StaminaNotification.Desc: Display a notification when Stamina is low.
Notification.LowStamina: Auto-Hoe has temporarily stopped due to low Stamina.
GMCM.CustomRange.Desc: Customize the hoeâ€™s range. When not toggled, the range will adjust based on the tool's upgrade level.
GMCM.CustomEfficiency.Desc: Customize the hoe's efficiency. When not toggled, efficiency will adjust based on the tool's upgrade level.
GMCM.Efficiency.Desc: Number of tiles that can be hoed per action.
GMCM.MarkHotkey.Desc: Press to mark/unmark the nearest eligible tile.
